tags: None
review: I had fever in last weeks of pregnancy which was diagnosed as dengue fever.I visited many hospitals of repute in south Delhi where doctors scared me about various complications and even death of baby.Then I met my angel doctor (Dr Rosy)  through one of my friends who very patiently heard my story and guided me .She was very polite, thoroughly professional and explained me in depth the pros and cons of having this disease during this time of pregnancy.I cannot express in words the admiration I have for this doctor who pulled me through my difficult times and I delivered a normal healthy baby .Hats off to such doctors!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: i have never found a doctor like Dr rosy in my life.  i was so much anxious and in panic state in my first pregnancy. after going to many doctors , when i found her, i knew she was the one i am looking for. she is so friendly that never for a second i felt discomfort. i was so relieved after coming in contact with her. at every point she helped me on calls or texts no matter what time is . she cleared my all doubts and fears so calmly. in short i would say â€œ i am blessed to find a doctor like her in my pregnancy â€œ

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Rosy is excellent professional. I had gone to her for infertility evaluation and because of her treatment and care conceived within a year. I also continued ANC with her. She is very friendly and gives ample time to resolve your queries. I liked the way she handled infertility treatment, always reaasuring. She will neither give you false hopes nor discourage you but will support you throughout. She is reachable at all times which is very rare among busy doctors. Would definitely recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: She is very experienced and Sharp. My wife tested COVID positive in her 8th month of pregnancy. The way she treated her on every parameter after COVID damage was tremendous. I strongly recommend her. She is great at her profession but at the same time she is nice human being.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Doctor Rosy Is very friendly with the patients and transparent in her treatment. She explains each and everything what we have to do, how we have to do and carefully listen the queries of the patient. Easily accessible on phone in emergency at any time. 
We are very thank full of Rosy mam for everything.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Rosy is very compassionate and she always listens to my worries patiently and takes time to make me understand about my treatment. Even during the days of lockdown, she was reachable over phone and she responded to all my questions without any delay . I would highly recommend Dr Rosy for all gynaecological issues .

tags: None
review:
Rosy maam has been instrumental in my fight against PCOD and infertility. She is confident and knows exactly what treatment would suit the patient. She goes all out to get the necessary procedures and medications on time 

She is a blessing to have as a doctor ! One of the finest gynaecologist to have in Delhi/NCR

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have consulted doc Rosy in the third trimester of my pregnancy. My pregnancy got little bit complicated with the growth retardation of my baby. Fully entrusting the doc, i took her medications,and advice which has always been genuine and i successfully delivered my normal baby . She is humble,polite and do listen to patient very patiently. I fully recommend her to all .

review: Dr.  Dhall tooks my concern seriously,  from 6 month of pregnancy to delivery,  every treatment by her was very helpful.  Already my family member was treated by her previously,  and her experience was also excellent with Dr dhall,  so she referred me the name of Dr. Dhall.  I am satisfied.

review: Since the beginning of pregnancy, my wife and I have been visiting her regularly. Dr Rosy has been very friendly and supportive. We were nervous and tensed but she made us feel relaxed and safe through out the pregnancy journey. And last but not least, she is always there whenever we need her. So a deep "Thank You" to Dr Rosy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: It was my first appointment with Dr Rosy Dhall. She was friendly, compassionate and listened to my issues patiently. She explained everything in detail and ensured all my queries are answered. I highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is very approachable and explains the issue and solutions well. Doesn't give unnecessary medication.
